about_the_game:
Face off in Don't Shoot First, a Wild West duel where timing is everything. Draw too soon, you lose. Wait too long… it’s over. Do you have the nerves to hold back and the reflexes to strike at the perfect moment?

Put on your cowboy hat and step into the pixelated Wild West, where every duel is a nerve-wracking showdown. Don't Shoot First challenges you to outwit your opponent by waiting for that perfect, split-second opportunity. But beware—draw too soon, and you’ll lose. Wait too long, and your opponent won’t hesitate to take the shot.

Key Features:

  • Intense One-on-One Duels: Experience the thrill of Western standoffs with pixel-perfect timing.

  • Easy to Learn, Hard to Master: Simple controls make it easy to jump in, but only the most patient gunslingers will dominate.

  • Pixel Art Western Aesthetic: Immerse yourself in a retro-style Wild West, complete with detailed pixel art scenes that bring classic Western towns to life.

  • Quick, Addictive Gameplay: Perfect for short gaming sessions, each duel will keep you on the edge of your seat.

Are you ready to become a legend of the Wild West… or will you make the fatal mistake of shooting first?

name: Don't Shoot First!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 7
  • Processor: Intel Celeron
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Intel I3
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated
